Package edu.umb.cs682.ecom.backend.security.jwt

Class JwtUtils

  • Object
    • JwtUtils
  • @Component
public class JwtUtils
extends Object
    JwtUtils is a utility class that provides methods for working with JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String generateJwtToken​(Authentication authentication)
      Generates a JWT using the given Authentication object.

      Extracts a JWT id string from a JWT.

      Extracts a User's username from a JWT string.
      Token makeTokenFromJwtString​(String token)
      Produces a Token object from a JWT string.

    • Method Detail

      • generateJwtToken

        public String generateJwtToken​(Authentication authentication)
        Generates a JWT using the given Authentication object. The given Authentication object contains information regarding the user that initiated the http request.
        Parameters:
        authentication - the Authentication object containing user information
        Returns:
        the generated JSON Web Token

      • getIdFromJwtToken

        public String getIdFromJwtToken​(String token)
        Extracts a JWT id string from a JWT.
        Parameters:
        token - the token from which an ID will be extracted
        Returns:
        the extracted token ID

      • makeTokenFromJwtString

        public Token makeTokenFromJwtString​(String token)
        Produces a Token object from a JWT string.
        Parameters:
        token - the JWT string
        Returns:
        the Token object produced

      • getUserNameFromJwtToken

        public String getUserNameFromJwtToken​(String token)
        Extracts a User's username from a JWT string.
        Parameters:
        token - the JWT string to extract the username from
        Returns:
        the User's username

      • validateJwtToken

        public boolean validateJwtToken​(String authToken)
                         throws ExpiredJwtException
        Validates a JSON Web Token string.

        This method will throw an ExpiredJwtException if the JWT is not in the TokenWhitelist, and returns false if the token is not valid in any other way.

        Parameters:
        authToken - the JWT to be validated
        Returns:
        true if the JWT is valid and false otherwise
        Throws:
        ExpiredJwtException - to be caught by AuthTokenFilter
